scripts.dev: nodemon -e js,mjs,cjs,json,ts --watch backend/src --exec node --env-file .env --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning --loader ts-node/esm backend/src/index.ts
scripts.build: npm install && tsc && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.build-with-prisma: npm install && tsc && prisma generate --schema=./backend/prisma/schema.prisma && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
